subject: Your Netflix receipt for December 2024
body:
Hi James,

Thanks for being a Netflix member! Your monthly payment of £15.99 was successful.

Plan: Premium (4K Ultra HD)
Billing date: December 7, 2024
Payment method: Visa ending in 4829

Enjoy watching!

The Netflix Team

subject: Security alert: New sign-in to your Google Account
body:
Hi James,

Your Google Account was just signed in to from a new Windows device.

Device: Windows PC
Location: London, United Kingdom
Time: December 6, 2024, 3:45 PM GMT

If this was you, you can ignore this email. If you didn't sign in, secure your account immediately.

Google Security Team

subject: HMRC: Your Self Assessment tax return is due
body:
Dear Mr Mitchell,

This is a reminder that your Self Assessment tax return for the 2023-24 tax year must be submitted by 31 January 2025.

If you file online, any tax owed must also be paid by this date to avoid penalties and interest.

Your Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 1234567890

File your return at: www.gov.uk/self-assessment-tax-returns

HM Revenue & Customs

subject: Q4 2024 Trust Fund Statement - Mitchell Family Trust
body:
Dear James,

Please find enclosed your quarterly statement for the Mitchell Family Trust.

Period: October - December 2024
Opening Balance: £847,234.56
Investment Returns: +£12,456.78
Distributions: -£5,000.00
Closing Balance: £854,691.34

Your next scheduled distribution of £5,000 will be processed on January 15, 2025.

For any queries, please contact your relationship manager, Sarah Chen, at 020 7123 4567.

Meridian Trust Management

subject: Transaction alert: £2,500.00 sent
body:
Hi James,

A payment has been made from your Revolut account.

Amount: £2,500.00
To: Johnson & Partners Solicitors
Reference: INV-2024-0892
Date: December 5, 2024
Balance after: £4,782.31

If you didn't make this payment, freeze your card immediately in the app.

Revolut Security

subject: Payment declined - action required
body:
Hi James,

We tried to charge your payment method for your Spotify Premium subscription, but the payment was declined.

Amount: £10.99
Payment method: Visa ending in 4829

Please update your payment details within 7 days to avoid service interruption.

Update payment: https://www.spotify.com/account/subscription

Spotify

subject: Payout initiated: £1,247.83
body:
Hi James,

A payout of £1,247.83 has been initiated to your bank account ending in 9012.
